title: Is there a way to screen mirror my pixel 3a to my tv? Using a USB to HDMI ?
content: I'm frustrated that I can not connect my phone to a tv or projector with ANY wired solution. I have no option to use chrome cast. Has google decided to fix this issue, or will I have to by a different branded fruit phone? I thought getting a pixel meant getting the best of Google. Now I'm not sure it is worth it.
